original_title: The Almighty Tycoon of the Ninja
overview: Ninja Tycoon is the tycoon of all ninjas and battles evil corporates and robots, in order to save the whole planet, with no remorse! Meanwhile, he is searching for the killers of his parents and wife. Soon, he discovers a lethal conspiracy that involves his own brutal death.
title: The Almighty Tycoon of the Ninja
